p: To the best of our knowledge, there are no example in the literature of natural stilbenoids tested as SARS-CoV inhibitors. However, a series of twelve synthetic resveratrol analogues were prepared and evaluated by Li et al. as potential inhibitors of SARS-CoV replication in Vero E6 cells. In particular, compounds 5 and 6 ( Fig. 6) did not show cytotoxicity in concentration ≥2 mg/mL (8.2 mM) and were able to inhibit the cytopathic effect (CPE) in concentration < 0.5 mg/mL (2.05 mM). Possible lower doses were not investigated [ 40].
